objects.description: Use application whitelisting configured to block execution of MSBuild.exe, dnx.exe, rcsi.exe, WinDbg.exe, and cdb.exe if they are not required for a given system or network to prevent potential misuse by adversaries.

external_references.source_name: Microsoft GitHub Device Guard CI Policies
external_references.description: Microsoft. (2017, June 16). Deploy code integrity policies: steps. Retrieved June 28, 2017.

external_references.source_name: Exploit Monday Mitigate Device Guard Bypases
external_references.description: Graeber, M. (2016, September 8). Using Device Guard to Mitigate Against Device Guard Bypasses. Retrieved September 13, 2016.
Graeber, M. (2016, November 13). DeviceGuardBypassMitigationRules. Retrieved November 30, 2016.
Smith, C. (2016, September 13). Bypassing Application Whitelisting using MSBuild.exe - Device Guard Example and Mitigations. Retrieved September 13, 2016.
